I wish the primary focus was (in order): Privacy/fungibility, throughput/scale, mobile support. I've seen no evidence of this being the focus, which has driven me to gradually diversify into XMR, ZEC, BCH over the years. I wish I didn't have to do that. I used to be 100% BTC.

Trading shitcoins is still a viable strategy for big gains but y'all can't be 100% in low and mid caps.  As far as we are concerned BTC, ETH, LTC, XMR, and DOGE are the only coins beyond the 'total speculation' phase of their development
